summary: A married couple grieving the recent death of their young daughter are in Venice when they encounter two elderly sisters, one of whom is psychic and brings a warning from beyond.
cast: Julie Christie|Donald Sutherland|Hilary Mason|Clelia Matania|Massimo Serato|Renato Scarpa|Giorgio Trestini|Leopoldo Trieste|David Tree|Ann Rye|Nicholas Salter|Sharon Williams|Bruno Cattaneo|Adelina Poerio
title: Amenaza en la sombra
